presentation.title: Ziqhelise ngodliwanondlebe lwakho olulandelayo!
presentation.message:
Ngaba ukuthatha udliwanondlebe lomsebenzi kukwenza uloyiko kwaye unexhala?
Mhlawumbi usaziva ungakulungelanga ukuthatha udliwanondlebe lomsebenzi?
Le yinkqubo egqibeleleyo yokuziqhelanisa nezakhono zakho zokuncokola kwiseti yodliwanondlebe!

presentation.title: Zilungiselele umsebenzi wakho olandelayo!
presentation.message: I-Jobliviewer isebenzisa amandla okuba nobuchule bokwenza izinto zokwenza udliwanondlebe oluyinyani ukukunceda ukuba usebenzise imbonakalo efunekayo ukuze wenze umbono ofanelekileyo wobomi bakho bokwenyani.

presentation.title: I-Premium Redumbunter:
presentation.message: Fumana ingxelo ekupheleni kodliwanondlebe ngalunye lwesishwankathela le incoko ngengxelo kunye nengcebiso malunga nendlela yokuphucula amathuba akho okuqeshwa kudliwanondlebe lokwenyani.

list.title: Cima iMbali?
list.message: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukuyicima yonke imbali?

validation.title: Impazamo yokuqinisekisa
validation.invalid_fields:
Faka indima efanelekileyo yomsebenzi osebenzayo yokufaka isicelo sodliwanondlebe olutsha lomsebenzi.
Ngenye indlela

color_scheme.name: Umxholo omnyama
color_scheme.description:
Khetha phakathi kokukhanya kunye nomxholo omnyama.
Beka umxholo wesixhobo okokuqala uvula usetyenziso.

language.name: Ulwimi
language.description: Khetha ulwimi olukhethiweyo ukubonisa ngelixa usebenzisa isicelo kwaye uthethe kwi-AI ngexesha lodliwanondlebe.

cooldown.description:
Inguqulelo yasimahla ye-APP ikuvumela ukuba uthathe udliwanondlebe omnye ngeyure.

Ukuba ungathanda ukususa umda, susa iintengiso, kwaye ufumane ingxelo yengxelo ngengcebiso malunga nendlela yokuphucula emva kokuba udliwanondlebe, cinga ngepremiyamu.
cooldown.active:
Lindela ixesha lesilumkiso ngaphambi kokuba uve udliwanondlebe olutsha.

Ukuba ungathanda ukususa i-Coolddown, ususe iintengiso, kwaye ufumane ingxelo yengxelo malunga nendlela yokuphucula emva kokuba udliwanondlebe ngalunye, cinga ngepremiyamu.

review.request:
Ukuba uyithandile i-APP, nceda uqaphele ukuhamba uphononongo ukusinceda.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

subscription.title: Ipremiyamu
subscription.thanks: Enkosi ngokubhalisa kwipremiyamu! Sikunqwenelela ithamsanqa kunye nempumelelo kulo lonke udliwanondlebe lwakho lwexesha elizayo!

error.subscription_options:
Ayikwazi ukulayisha izicwangciso zokubhalisela.

Nceda ujonge uqhagamshelo lwakho lwe-Intanethi, okanye uzame kwakhona kamva.

error.title: Impazamo
error.unexpected: Kukho into engahambanga kakuhle ... awungekhe uyibone le nto! üò±
error.connection_fix: Jonga uqhagamshelo lwakho lwe-Intanethi kwaye uzame kwakhona kamva.

store.short_description: Ukuziqhelanisa nodliwanondlebe lwakho olulandelayo ngale nto
store.full_description:
Ngaba ukuthatha udliwanondlebe lomsebenzi kukwenza uloyiko kwaye unexhala?
Mhlawumbi usaziva ungakulungelanga ukuthatha udliwanondlebe lomsebenzi?
Le yinkqubo egqibeleleyo yokuziqhelanisa nezakhono zakho zokuncokola kwiseti yodliwanondlebe!

I-Jobliviewer isebenzisa amandla okuba nobuchule bokwenza izinto zokwenza udliwanondlebe oluyinyani ukukunceda ukuba uchithe ubuchule obufunekayo bokwenza udliwanondlebe olulandelayo.

Udliwanondlebe lulungiselelwe indawo yomsebenzi oyifunayo, kwaye uya kwenziwa kwaye uhlengahlengiswe ngemibuzo enxulumene neenjongo zakho ukuze ubonakale udliwanondlebe lokwenyani.

Abasebenzisi beeprimiyamu baya kufumana ingxelo ekupheleni kodliwano-ndlebe,

premium_benefits: Fumana iingxelo ezinengxelo nengcebiso emva kodliwanondlebe

translation.title: Nceda ukuguqulela
translation.description: Nceda ukuguqulela esi sicelo kwezinye iilwimi.
